overview:
Chief Financial Officer (CFO) - Maurice van Baaren - Linkedin Maurice has a BA in Economics and a post-graduate degree in Auditing (Register-accountant) from the Vrije Universiteit te Amsterdam, Netherlands. He was an accountant at several accountingfirms (including a big-four firm). After that he acquired more experience in the business life. Formerly he was a senior controller at the the real estate company Hanzevast, Groningen and controller in a large, International Flower exporter in Aalsmeer. Maurice brings a strong portfolio of senior auditing experience and financial education to the Worldticketshop board.

  1. He is responsible for planning & control, financial systems and broad fiscal knowledge.

http://www.linkedin.com/in/mauricevanbaaren
